instructions: In WhatsApp, tap Chats at the bottom of the screen. The New Groups option won't be visible if you don't have any open chats on this screen. Tap New Group in the right top corner. Choose the participants that you wish to add to the group, then tap Next . You can also add people later, so don't worry if you miss someone. On the next screen, choose a subject (name) for the group, then tap Create . To create a group message, tap in the compose area, enter your message, then tap send . To place a call to the group, tap the phone icon in the top right.
